data.name: Table Ball - Colours DLC 3
data.detailed_description:
Custom Colours DLC 3

Do you want to customise your bumpers and balls?

WELL NOW YOU CAN

Features

New Colours
4 new colours to choose from.
Wanting a nice sun yellow ball? Well you can have that.
Want your bumpers to be pearl green? You can do that too
Want your bumpers to be emerald green while your ball is claret violet? OF COURSE YOU CAN.

What colours are included?

Sun Yellow, Pearl Green, Emerald Green and Claret Violet

data.short_description: The Table Ball - Colours DLC 3 adds four different colours that can be used to customise your Table Ball experience. Make your bumpers and balls Sun Yellow, Pearl Green, Emerald Green or Claret Violet, it's all up to you in the Table Ball Colours DLC 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None

  • Graphics: NVIDIA Quadro 2000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: None
